info.description: This is the API for the Secret Guest application.
info.title: Secret Guest API

post.description: Creates new assignment object. Available for admin only.

409.description: Assignment cannot be created (e.g., wrong payload)

post.description: Creates new listing object. Available for admin only.

409.description: Listing cannot be created (e.g., wrong payload)

post.description: Handles OTA Reservations Events. Available for admin only.

get.description: Returns a list of all Answer Types with optional filtering.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Answer Type IDs
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Answer Type slugs
parameters.name: slug

post.description: Creates a new Answer Type.

409.description: Duplicate slug

get.description: Returns a single Answer Type by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Answer Type. Deletion will fail if the type is used in any checklist items.

409.description: Answer Type is in use and cannot be deleted
Duplicate slug

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all assignments with optional filters. Available for staff only.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more status IDs
parameters.name: status_id

get.description: Returns a paginated list of assignments for the current user.
Returns details of a specific assignment belonging to the current user.

404.description: Assignment not found or does not belong to user

post.description: Accept an assignment offer. This will start an asynchronous process to generate a report.

404.description: Assignment not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Assignment cannot be accepted (e.g., wrong status)

post.description: Decline an assignment offer.

404.description: Assignment not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Assignment cannot be declined (e.g., wrong status)

get.description: Returns details of any assignment. Available for staff only.

post.description: Cancel an assignment offer.

404.description: Assignment not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Assignment cannot be cancelled

post.description: Refresh a JWT token using a refresh token
Register a user with username, password, and email

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

409.description: User with this username or email already exists

post.description: Generates a new JWT access token for authentication.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Validates the provided JWT access token.

get.description: Returns a list of all Checklist Items.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Checklist Item IDs
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Checklist Item slugs
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type IDs
parameters.name: listing_type_id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type slugs
parameters.name: listing_type_slug

post.description: Creates a new Checklist Item.

400.description: Invalid payload or non-existent foreign key

409.description: Duplicate slug for this listing type

get.description: Returns a single Checklist Item by its ID.

409.description: Duplicate slug or other constraint violation

get.description: Returns a list of all Checklist Sections.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Checklist Section IDs
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Checklist Section slugs
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type IDs
parameters.name: listing_type_id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type slugs
parameters.name: listing_type_slug

post.description: Creates a new Checklist Section.

409.description: Duplicate slug for this listing type

get.description: Returns a single Checklist Section by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Checklist Section. Deletion will fail if the section is used in any checklist items.

409.description: Checklist Section is in use and cannot be deleted
Duplicate slug for this listing type

get.description: Returns a list of all Listing Types.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type IDs
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Listing Type slugs
parameters.name: slug

post.description: Creates a new Listing Type.

409.description: Duplicate slug

get.description: Returns a single Listing Type by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Listing Type. Deletion will fail if the type is used in any listings.

409.description: Listing Type is in use and cannot be deleted
Duplicate slug

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all active listings.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more listing type IDs
parameters.name: listing_type_id

get.description: Returns detailed information about a single active listing.
Returns a paginated list of all Media Requirements.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Media Requirements IDs
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by one or more Media Requirements slugs
parameters.name: slug

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all reports. Available for staff only.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more status IDs
parameters.name: status_id

get.description: Returns a paginated list of reports for the current user that are in progress.
Returns a specific report with its schema and answers for the current user to fill out.

404.description: Report not found or does not belong to user

patch.description: Saves the current state of a report draft.

400.description: Invalid request body or report ID

404.description: Report not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Report is not in a draft state and cannot be edited

post.description: Refuses a report, setting its status to 'refused'. The report can no longer be edited after this.

404.description: Report not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Report is not in a draft state

post.description: Submits a completed report for review. The report can no longer be edited after this.

400.description: Invalid report ID or report is not complete

404.description: Report not found or does not belong to user

409.description: Report is not in a draft state

get.description: Returns details of any report. Available for staff only.

post.description: Approves a submitted secret guest report. Available for staff only.

409.description: Report cannot be approved (e.g., wrong status)

post.description: Rejects a submitted secret guest report. Available for staff only. This action does not require a request body.

409.description: Report cannot be rejected (e.g., wrong status)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all OTA reservations. Available for staff only.

parameters.description: Filter by one or more status IDs
parameters.name: status_id

get.description: Returns detailed information about a single OTA reservation.

post.description: Changes OTA Reservation status to NoShow. Available for staff only.
Generates a presigned URL and form data for uploading a file directly to the file storage.

400.description: Invalid request body or file name

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users. Available for staff only.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and a JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
